entries.name: command_plugin(command)
entries.desc: Fetch the name of plugin handling the command

entries.name: global_index_file()
entries.desc: Path where the global index file is stored

entries.name: hook_plugins(event)
entries.desc: Returns the list of plugin names handling the passed event

entries.name: local_index_file()
entries.desc: Path where the local index file is stored

entries.name: register_plugin(name, path, load_paths, commands, sources, hooks)
entries.desc: This function is to be called when a new plugin is installed. This function shall add the functions of the plugin to existing maps and also the name to source location.
